title: Count vowels in a string
description: Given a lowercase string, return the number of vowels (a,e,i,o,u).

title: Find maximum number in an array
description: Return the largest number from an array of integers.

title: Reverse a string (no built-in reverse)
description: Reverse a given string without using built-in reverse().

title: Check if two strings are anagrams
description: Return true if strings are anagrams (case-insensitive), false otherwise.

title: Remove duplicates from array
description: Return array with duplicates removed, preserving original order.

title: First non-repeating character
description: Return first character that does not repeat; return '_' if none.

title: Sum of array
description: Return sum of all numbers in an array.

title: Check palindrome
description: Return true if string is palindrome (ignoring case), else false.

title: Count words in a sentence
description: Return number of words separated by spaces (ignore extra spaces).

title: Merge two sorted arrays (into new array)
description: Given two sorted arrays, return merged sorted array.

title: Find index of element
description: Return index of target in array or -1.

title: Check prime
description: Return true if number is prime.

title: Factorial (iterative)
description: Return factorial of n (n!).

title: Fibonacci (iterative)
description: Return nth Fibonacci number (0-indexed).

title: Swap two numbers without temp
description: Swap a and b using arithmetic or XOR.

title: Check even/odd
description: Return true if number is even.
solution: function isEven(n) { return n % 2 === 0; }

title: Sum of digits
description: Return sum of digits of a positive integer.

title: Capitalize words
description: Capitalize first letter of each word.

title: Rotate array right by k
description: Rotate elements to the right by k positions.

title: Check power of two
description: Return true if n is power of two.
solution: function isPowerOfTwo(n) { return n > 0 && (n & (n - 1)) === 0; }
